diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Alcoholic pancreatitis - resolved. Chronic Alcohol Use
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient has a history of alcoholic liver disease and presented with vomiting, inability to tolerate oral intake, and recent gastrointestinal symptoms. The ultrasound revealed heterogeneously echogenic liver consistent with her diagnosis of alcoholic pancreatitis. No other specific findings indicated an acute process, leading to the conclusion that her alcoholic pancreatitis is resolved.
